typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) view external returns (address[] memory)

nodes.name: countGroupMembership

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) view external returns (address[] memory)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets all indices in the provided group for a member.
 If the given operator is not a member, returns an empty array.
nodes.name: getGroupMemberIndices
awaitingRewards
withdrawableRewards

attributes.name: countGroupMembership

attributes.type: function (bytes memory) view external returns (address[] memory)

attributes.documentation:
@notice Gets all indices in the provided group for a member.
 If the given operator is not a member, returns an empty array.
attributes.name: getGroupMemberIndices

attributes.type: function (bytes memory) view external returns (address[] memory)

attributes.name: awaitingRewards
withdrawableRewards

params.groupPubKey: The public key of the group.

countGroupMembership(bytes,address).return: The number of members the operator has in the group.

awaitingRewards(address,uint256).notice: Get the amount of group rewards allocated to the given operator in the given group. The rewards may or may not be withdrawable.

countGroupMembership(bytes,address).notice: Counts how many times the operator is present in a group.

getGroupMemberIndices(bytes,address).notice: Gets all indices in the provided group for a member. If the given operator is not a member, returns an empty array.

withdrawableRewards(address,uint256).notice: Get the amount of group rewards withdrawable by the given operator in the given group. The group must be stale for any group rewards to be withdrawn.
